message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $105. I can do $115, as I mentioned earlier, or we can discuss further. But I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway at $112.5. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $108? I'm really interested in the product and don't want to walk away, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $108, but I was thinking we could do a bit better than that. How about $109? I'm willing to make a small concession to get the deal done.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $107? I'm really interested in the product and don't want to walk away, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make another small concession to get the deal done. How about $108.25? I'm hoping we can meet in the middle and make this work.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice! I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about $108? I think this is as low as I can go, but I really want to make this deal work.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can go any lower than $108.25. I'm willing to make one last concession to get the deal done. How about we meet exactly at $108.25? It's a fair price, and I think we can both be happy with it.

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with $108.25. I've already stretched my budget as far as I can. I'm going to have to walk away from this deal. Sorry, Alice. I appreciate your time and effort, but I think I'll have to look elsewhere.
